title: Goerli sync stuck
body:
Hi, experiencing a Goerli sync issue. Found https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/issues/2851 which might be related but was supposed to be fixed

#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2022.02.4-beta`

OS & Version: `Linux e231be82ca11 4.18.0-348.2.1.el8_5.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Nov 16 14:42:35 UTC 2021 x86_64 Linux`

Commit hash : `https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/tree/v2022.02.04`

#### Expected behaviour

Successful sync

#### Actual behaviour

Hi, when syncing Goerli, Erigon seems stuck at 

```
[INFO] [03-14|16:28:39.154] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=6534226 blk/second=0.000 alloc="521.90 MiB" sys="4.85 GiB"
```

The log context, which mentions a bad block hash, is:

```

(stuck at "Wrote block headers", keeps printing the line at that block height)
```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Not sure how reproducible that is. Normal erigon command setting chain and datadir. Maybe worth mentioning that no pruning args are set


#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````

1. restart didn't help? 
2. i see GoodPeers=30 then problem is not in discovery of peers
3. as the hotfix you can do:
```
make integration
./build/bin/integration state_stages --datadir=<your_datadir> --unwind=100 --integrity.fast=false
./build/bin/integration stage_bodies --datadir=<your_datadir> --unwind=100 
./build/bin/integration stage_headers --datadir=<your_datadir> --unwind=100
# start Erigon as usually
```
